textSection.text: “Be open minded, take risks and push your boundaries! We can't wait to see you there and be part of this incredible journey together!”  -says Monika.

card1.name: Ana Hazler
card1.description: s a dynamic force in dance. A Croatian-born professional dancer, choreographer and teacher, based in Amsterdam since 2009. A graduate of the 'School of the Arts' Amsterdam, with an internship on Broadway in New York. Ana has danced, performed and taught worldwide—from Dubai to Senegal—and her choreography has appeared in music videos and commercials. As a seasoned judge, she has evaluated over 100 dance competitions, including European and World Championships. She founded Dutch Monsters to nurture dance talent across Europe and also runs Dansstudio Balance in Haarlem. Beyond dance, she holds a “Master’s in International Business Management”, proving her versatility both on and off the stage.

faq.q1: Who can join the Creative Movement Dance Camp?
faq.a1:
Anyone who fits into one of the following categories is welcome to join:

Young Creatives
- Up to age 15

Adult Creatives
- Age 15+
- More intensive program
- Pre-existing dance knowledge is advised, but not mandatory
faq.q2: How do I make a payment?
faq.a2:
Once we receive your online application—including your name, surname, email address, age, phone number, and chosen package—we will send you an email with payment details.

**Important:**
- Payment must be made within **3 days** of receiving the email; otherwise, your application will be considered invalid.
- When making the payment, please include the participant’s name and chosen package as transaction details.

For inquiries regarding **payment in installments or group registrations**, please contact us via creative.movement.camp@gmail.com.
faq.a3:
Once your application is submitted, you have up to **5 days** to make any changes or cancel, just in case your plans or circumstances change. After this period, refunds will no longer be available.
• The organizer reserves the right to modify/change the line-up, schedule, and location without obligation to issue refunds.
• Refunds are only possible if the camp is canceled by the organizer.
faq.a4:
Yes! If you apply as a group (6-15 people), you are eligible for a discount:
- **6-10 people:** 10% discount
- **10-15 people:** 15% discount

To apply as a group, provide the names of all group members in your application.

**Note:** If a member cancels, the group discount percentage may change accordingly.
faq.q5: Can I get assistance with accommodation?
faq.a5:
Yes, we provide accommodation options, but availability is limited. Please inform us in advance to secure a spot. Check the accommodation link (insert shortcut to link) and contact us via creative.movement.camp@gmail.com if you need assistance.

Additionally, **breakfast can be provided upon request** if arranged in advance.
